data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic is on target to give Milan a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 2, Rafael Leao instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick Milan.
Throw-in for Milan in the half of Roma.
In the minute 5, Milan's Zlatan Ibrahimovic is whistled for offside at Giuseppe Meazza.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Roma.
In the minute 7, Milan to take a throw-in in Roma territory.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 13, Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Roma.
Edin Dzeko equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
In the minute 14, Lorenzo Pellegrini with an assist there.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Milan.
In the minute 19, Roma's Rick Karsdorp gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Milan have a goal kick.
Rick Karsdorp for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 22, Milan have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
Milan's Hakan Calhanoglu is on target but unsuccessful.
Milan drive forward but Zlatan Ibrahimovic is judged offside.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Milan in their own half.
Corner awarded to Milan.
Throw-in high up the field for Milan in Milan.
In the minute 29, Milan's Theo Hernandez gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Roma defender.
Corner awarded to Milan.
Milan's Alessio Romagnoli goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 30, Milan have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
Very nearly a goal for Milan as Simon Kjaerstrikes the woodwork with a header.
Roger Ibanez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Roma.
In the minute 31, Roma's Lorenzo Pellegrini gets in a shot on goal at Giuseppe Meazza. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Roma's half?
Roma have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
In the minute 33, Roma have a dangerous throw-in.
Piero Giacomelli signals a throw-in for Roma, close to Milan's area.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 35, Theo Hernandez of Milan is pulled up for offside.
Can Milan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Roma's half?
Throw-in for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 37, Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Roma in the half of Milan.
Free kick Roma.
In the minute 39, Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
Corner awarded to Roma.
Piero Giacomelli blows against Milan's Zlatan Ibrahimovic for offside.
In the minute 42, Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Milan just outside Roma's area.
Milan pushes forward through Hakan Calhanoglu, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 44, Milan have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Milan.
Piero Giacomelli signals a Milan throw-in in Roma's half.
In the minute 45, Piero Giacomelli blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 47, Alexis Saelemaekers puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
Great play from Rafael Leao to set up the goal.
In Milan Roma drive forward through Henrikh Mkhitaryan. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 50, Piero Giacomelli awards Roma a goal kick.
Roma needs to be cautious. Milan have an attacking throw-in.
Edin Dzeko of Roma gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Milan goal kick.
In Milan Milan's Zlatan Ibrahimovic is caught offside.
Ball safe as Milan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in Roma.
Roma push forward at Giuseppe Meazza and Jordan Veretout gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Milan defence.
Alexis Saelemaekers (Milan) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 59, Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Roma close to the penalty box.
Piero Giacomelli awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 61, Roma have a dangerous throw-in.
Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
In the minute 64, Goal kick for Milan at Giuseppe Meazza.
Franck Kessie is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Bruno Peres is replacing Rick Karsdorp for the away team.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Roma.
In Milan, Gianluca Mancini (Roma) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Milan goal kick.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Roma in the half of Milan.
Roma have been awarded a penalty...
Franck Kessie returns to the field for Milan after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 70, Milan's Rafael Leao has been booked in Milan.
Goal! Jordan Veretout makes it 2-2. The equalizer came in the form of a penalty.
Samu Castillejo is replacing Rafael Leao for Milan at Giuseppe Meazza.
In the minute 72, The home team have replaced Alexis Saelemaekers with Rade Krunic. This is the second substitution made today by Stefano Pioli.
Samu Castillejo for the home team is judged to be offside.
Roma awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Roma in their own half.
Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Roma's half?
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
In the minute 75, At Giuseppe Meazza, Zlatan Ibrahimovic has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Important block from the Roma defence as Hakan Calhanoglu fires in a strike for Milan.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Milan at Giuseppe Meazza.
The away team replace Lorenzo Pellegrini with Bryan Cristante.
Rade Krunic (Milan) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Roma defenders.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
In the minute 77, Pedro (Roma) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Milan have been given a penalty at Giuseppe Meazza...
Goal! Zlatan Ibrahimovic gives Milan the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 3-2.
In the minute 81, In Milan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bryan Cristante for Roma has been booked by Piero Giacomelli and receives a first yellow card.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 82, Theo Hernandez (Milan) has received a yellow card from Piero Giacomelli.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
Corner awarded to Roma.
In the minute 84, Goal! Roma go level at 3-3 through Marash Kumbulla in Milan.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gonzalo Villar is on a sub for Jordan Veretout for Roma.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Roma in the half of Milan.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Milan.
In the minute 89, Hakan Calhanoglu for Milan drives towards goal at Giuseppe Meazza. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Milan's Zlatan Ibrahimovic has run offside.
At Giuseppe Meazza the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Piero Giacomelli signals a throw-in for Milan, close to Roma's area.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Milan.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Roma.
Roger Ibanez has recovered and rejoins the match in Milan.
Milan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Milan to take a throw-in in Roma territory.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
Alessio Romagnoli's header is off-target for Milan.
Piero Giacomelli awards Roma a goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 3-3.
Piero Giacomelli waits before resuming play because Roger Ibanez for Roma is still down.
